org.jetel.util

Class InputPortReadableChannel

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.jetel.util.InputPortReadableChannel
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Closeable, java.lang.AutoCloseable, java.nio.channels.Channel, java.nio.channels.ReadableByteChannel

    public class InputPortReadableChannel
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.nio.channels.ReadableByteChannel
    Implementation of java.nio.channels.ReadableByteChannel for reading data from input port (thread-safe).

      • isEOF

        public boolean isEOF()
              throws java.io.IOException
        Returns:
